title: Nous Research drops Hermes 4 AI models that outperform ChatGPT without content restrictions
optimized_headline: Nous Research unveils Hermes 4 AI models surpassing ChatGPT's content limits
raw_excerpt: Nous Research launches Hermes 4 open-source AI models that outperform ChatGPT on math benchmarks with uncensored responses and hybrid reasoning capabilities.
raw_body: Nous Research launches Hermes 4 open-source AI models that outperform ChatGPT on math benchmarks with uncensored responses and hybrid reasoning capabilities.
speedrun: Nous Research has unveiled its Hermes 4 AI models, which surpass ChatGPT in math performance. These models stand out due to their ability to provide uncensored responses and employ hybrid reasoning techniques. This release could shift the landscape of AI tools, especially in educational and professional settings where accurate math solutions are crucial. The implications of this development are significant, as it challenges the dominance of existing models like ChatGPT.
why_it_matters: Educators and students could benefit from more accurate and unrestricted math tools, enhancing learning and problem-solving capabilities.
This launch signals a broader shift towards open-source AI, encouraging competition and innovation in the AI market.

lenses.eli12: Nous Research's new Hermes 4 models are like a calculator that not only gives the right answers but also explains how it got there without holding back. They outperform ChatGPT in math, which means students and professionals can rely on them for better support. This matters because having accurate tools can help everyone learn and solve problems more effectively.
lenses.pm: For product managers and founders, Hermes 4's superior math performance and uncensored responses could meet a growing user need for reliable AI tools. This could lead to cost savings in development and increased efficiency in tasks requiring complex calculations. Incorporating these models could enhance product offerings and attract users seeking advanced capabilities.
lenses.engineer: Hermes 4 models have demonstrated superior performance on math benchmarks compared to ChatGPT, indicating advancements in their underlying algorithms. They utilize hybrid reasoning capabilities, which combine different reasoning techniques for improved accuracy. This technical evolution could influence how future AI models are developed, especially in tasks requiring complex mathematical reasoning.
